mapper.select: select project_id,sprint_id,sprint_date,issue_type,in_sprint,finished,not_started,create_time from issue_status where sprint_id = #{sprintId} and sprint_date = #{sprintDate} and issue_type = #{issueType}
mapper.update: update issue_status set in_sprint = #{inSprint},finished = #{finished},not_started=#{notStarted} where sprint_id = #{sprintId} and sprint_date = #{sprintDate} and issue_type = #{issueType}
